title: Homecraft in Sweden
brief_description: Describes the many aspects of handicrafts in Sweden and shows how these have strong roots in the traditions of the ocuntry. Amongst the handicrafts shown are: upholstery making, carpet making, lace making, weaving, basket making, knitting, iron work, and pottery. Describes the techniques used in these crafts and shows numerous examples of the quality of the work produced.
